ComicInfo.Summary: In the third and final issue of Andrea Camic's beautiful comic series, the strength of the art is matched only by the dynamic, engaging quality of the storytelling. Based on a story by Italian novelist Celestino Pes, this issue follows the fragile beauty and everpresent cruelty of an all-girls boarding school. Jennifer can only dream of being with her stunning classmate and archenemy, Clara. Or can she make it real? Andrea Camic is an remarkably talented cartoonist whose work has appeared in the European magazines Blue and Kiss many times.
